title: ‡∏ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏õ‡∏¥‡∏î‡πÅ‡∏ü‡∏•‡∏ä v2
subtitle: (Direct Flash Photo)
prompt: You will be given two images. The first is the user's input photo. The second is a style reference photo. Your task is to completely transform the lighting and mood of the user's photo to match the direct flash photography aesthetic of the reference photo. The subject from the user's photo should be fully and brightly illuminated by a harsh, on-camera flash, creating a sharp, hard-edged shadow directly behind them. The background should become significantly darker and underexposed. The final output must capture the high-contrast, sharp, and raw 'paparazzi' feel of the reference image, applied to the subject and scene of the user's photo.
